thread.title: Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux announce separation

title: Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux announce separation
text:
Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux announce separation Friday, February 16, 2018 - 00:51 
Former ''Friends'' star Jennifer Aniston and her husband Justin Theroux are separating after less than three years of marriage. Jane Ross reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former "Friends" star Jennifer Aniston and her husband Justin Theroux are separating after less than three years of marriage. Jane Ross reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sF5tnJ
